text: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become a crucial innovation deeply integrated into our everyday lives and industrial processes. Its swift development holds the potential for significant transformations across numerous fields, spanning from advanced industries to the experiences of regular people. AI continuously enhances human interactions and extends our capabilities. For example, modern educational institutions utilize AI algorithms to track attendance through facial recognition technology. Looking forward, the emergence of autonomous vehicles signifies a paramount application of AI, where vehicles depend entirely on AI systems for tasks such as navigation, detecting traffic signals, and maneuvering on roads.
name: fid-094
